scripts.build: tsc && ncc build -s -o dist/restore src/main.ts --license license.txt && ncc build -s -o dist/save src/post.ts --license license.txt
scripts.lint: echo "Fake command that does nothing. It is used in reusable workflows"
scripts.cache-licensed: docker run --rm -ti -v $(pwd):/app --workdir=/app node:19 bash -c 'apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends make cmake pkg-config ruby-dev gcc libc6-dev libssl-dev && gem install licensed --source "https://rubygems.pkg.github.com/github" && licensed cache'
